title: Chess Game
description: This is a project made to learn C which is a command line interface chess game that had game saving functionality.

title: Raspberry Pi Camera
description: This is a project made in python to be able to display the video feed from a rasbperry pi camera module on a webserver.

title: CodeFriend
description: Lightweight coding assistant to help user generate code and explain explain concepts.

title: MockMate
description: MockMate is a full-stack, AI-powered, voice-enabled interview preparation platform designed to help users simulate real interview scenarios and receive tailored feedback instantly.
